## group() function

Run code inside a group.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export function group<T>(name: string, fn: () => T): T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | <code>string</code> | Name of the group. |
|  fn | <code>() =&gt; T</code> | Group body. Code to be executed in the group context. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`T`

The return value of `fn`<!-- -->.

## Remarks

Groups are used to organize results in a test.
